content:
---
title: User Profile Disk - Registry file loaded
group: Microsoft RDS Events - User Profile Disk
description: User Profile Disk - Registry file loaded
authors:
  - Catarina de Faria


kind: evtx
level: info
status: stable
timestamp: Event.System.TimeCreated


fields:
  - name: Event ID
    to: Event.System.EventID
  - name: Channel
    to : Event.System.Channel
  - name: Computer
    to: Event.System.Computer
  - name: Information
    to: Event.EventData.File

filter:
  condition: upd_registry_file_loaded and upd_channel 

  upd_registry_file_loaded:
    Event.System.EventID: 5
  upd_channel:
    Event.System.Channel: Microsoft-Windows-User Profile Service/Operational

---
title: RD Web Access - An account was successfully logged on
group: Microsoft RDS Events - RD Web Access Successful Logon
description: An account was successfully logged on at the RD Web Access server
date: 2023-07-03
version: 1.0
authors:
  - Catarina de Faria


kind: evtx
level: info
status: stable
timestamp: Event.System.TimeCreated


fields:
  - name: Event ID
    to: Event.System.EventID
  - name: Channel
    to : Event.System.Channel
  - name: Computer
    to: Event.System.Computer
  - name: IpAddress
    to: Event.EventData.IpAddress
  - name: LogonType
    to: Event.EventData.LogonType
  - name: TargetUserName
    to: Event.EventData.TargetUserName
  - name: WorkstationName
    to: Event.EventData.WorkstationName

filter:
  condition: successful_logon and security_channel and rd_web_access 

  successful_logon:
    Event.System.EventID: 4624
  security_channel:
    Event.System.Channel: Security
  rd_web_access:
    Event.EventData.SubjectUserName: RDWebAccess

---
title: RD Gateway - A user disconnected from a resource
group: Microsoft RDS Events - RD Gateway
description: A user disconnected from a network resource. Before the user disconnected, the number of bytes transferred/received and the client session duration were registered.
date: 2023-07-03
version: 1.0
authors: 
  - Catarina de Faria


kind: evtx
level: info
status: stable
timestamp: Event.System.TimeCreated


fields:
  - name: Event ID
    to: Event.System.EventID
  - name: Channel
    to : Event.System.Channel
  - name: Computer
    to: Event.System.Computer
  - name: Information
    to: Event.UserData.EventInfo

filter:
  condition: rd_rap

  rd_rap:
      Event.System.EventID: 303
      Event.System.Channel: Microsoft-Windows-TerminalServices-Gateway/Operational

---
title: RD Gateway - A user connected to a resource 
group: Microsoft RDS Events - RD Gateway
description: A user connected to a resource via the RD Gateway
date: 2023-07-03
version: 1.0
authors: 
  - Catarina de Faria


kind: evtx
level: info
status: stable
timestamp: Event.System.TimeCreated


fields:
  - name: Event ID
    to: Event.System.EventID
  - name: Channel
    to : Event.System.Channel
  - name: Computer
    to: Event.System.Computer
  - name: Information
    to: Event.UserData.EventInfo

filter:
  condition: rd_rap

  rd_rap:
      Event.System.EventID: 302
      Event.System.Channel: Microsoft-Windows-TerminalServices-Gateway/Operational

---
title: RD Gateway - RD RAP requirements met
group: Microsoft RDS Events - RD Gateway
description: The Resource Authorization Policy requirements were met, the user was authorized to connect to the resource
date: 2023-07-03
version: 1.0
authors: 
  - Catarina de Faria


kind: evtx
level: info
status: stable
timestamp: Event.System.TimeCreated


fields:
  - name: Event ID
    to: Event.System.EventID
  - name: Channel
    to : Event.System.Channel
  - name: Computer
    to: Event.System.Computer
  - name: Information
    to: Event.UserData.EventInfo

filter:
  condition: rd_rap

  rd_rap:
      Event.System.EventID: 300
      Event.System.Channel: Microsoft-Windows-TerminalServices-Gateway/Operational

---
title: RD Gateway - RD CAP requirements met
group: Microsoft RDS Events - RD Gateway
description: The Resource Authorization Policy requirements were met, the user was authorized to connect to the resource
date: 2023-07-03
version: 1.0
authors: 
  - Catarina de Faria


kind: evtx
level: info
status: stable
timestamp: Event.System.TimeCreated


fields:
  - name: Event ID
    to: Event.System.EventID
  - name: Channel
    to : Event.System.Channel
  - name: Computer
    to: Event.System.Computer
  - name: Information
    to: Event.UserData.EventInfo

filter:
  condition: rd_cap

  rd_cap:
      Event.System.EventID: 200
      Event.System.Channel: Microsoft-Windows-TerminalServices-Gateway/Operational

---
title: RD Connection Broker - Successfully processed a connection request
group: Microsoft RDS Events - RD Connection Broker
description: The RD Connection Broker successfully processed a connection request
date: 2023-07-03
version: 1.0
authors:
  - Catarina de Faria


kind: evtx
level: info
status: stable
timestamp: Event.System.TimeCreated


fields:
  - name: Event ID
    to: Event.System.EventID
  - name: Channel
    to : Event.System.Channel
  - name: Computer
    to: Event.System.Computer
  - name: Information
    to: Event.UserData.EventXML

filter:
  condition: rdcb_connection_request_success and session_broker_channel 

  rdcb_connection_request_success:
    Event.System.EventID: 801
  session_broker_channel:
    Event.System.Channel: Microsoft-Windows-TerminalServices-SessionBroker/Operational

---
title: RD Connection Broker - Connection request received
group: Microsoft RDS Events - RD Connection Broker
description: The RD Connection Broker received a connection request
authors:
  - Catarina de Faria


kind: evtx
level: info
status: stable
timestamp: Event.System.TimeCreated


fields:
  - name: Event ID
    to: Event.System.EventID
  - name: Channel
    to : Event.System.Channel
  - name: Computer
    to: Event.System.Computer
  - name: Information 
    to: Event.UserData.EventXML

filter:
  condition: rdcb_connection_request and session_broker_channel 

  rdcb_connection_request:
    Event.System.EventID: 800
  session_broker_channel:
    Event.System.Channel: Microsoft-Windows-TerminalServices-SessionBroker/Operational

---
title: RD Connection Broker - Successfully redirected the user to the endpoint 
group: Microsoft RDS Events - RD Connection Broker
description: The RD Connection Broker successfully redirected the user to the endpoint
date: 2023-07-03
version: 1.0
authors:
  - Catarina de Faria


kind: evtx
level: info
status: stable
timestamp: Event.System.TimeCreated


fields:
  - name: Event ID
    to: Event.System.EventID
  - name: Channel
    to : Event.System.Channel
  - name: Computer
    to: Event.System.Computer
  - name: Information
    to: Event.UserData.EventXML

filter:
  condition: rdcb_success_client_redirect and session_broker_channel 

  rdcb_success_client_redirect:
    Event.System.EventID: 1307
  session_broker_channel:
    Event.System.Channel: Microsoft-Windows-TerminalServices-SessionBroker-Client/Operational
